title: Tahm Kench, the River King, available now

replies.body: Kirby, before his coffee in the morning...
He has "come to devour us all", to protect us from the enemy champs.{{champion:223}}

Was playing some games with some friends earlier this evening, with a Tahm Kench supporting our bot lane, bot lane was feeding in chat and it took me a little while to realise why. Tahm had been picking up our adc and throwing him under the enemy tower.
where do i go to leave a complaint about how a champ works? cause the adc could do nothing to escape the friendly Tahm Kench before the tower. or are we missing a mechanic such as left click?
How to create an OP champ Featuring ..... RITOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO{{item:3073}}
can't picture Tahm Kench eat Cho-gath (6 stacks of feast) or Mega Gnar or maybe Nunu.
